description:
Aqua Container Security Platform - server component.

The Aqua Container Security Platform provides full development-to-production lifecycle controls for securing containerized applications, running on-premises or in the cloud, on Windows or Linux.
name: aqua-web
preInstallNotes: Set up postgres service first, then use advanced install to add license key.
postInstallNotes: Aqua server has been installed. You can now install the gateway.
postUninstallNotes: Aqua server container have been uninstalled.
